title: Valance, 1770–84
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
markings: Text which begins " Del..." on a sign board on a tree. The rest of the text is not readable.
description:
Valance  made of one complete width and three incomplete widths of the pattern. 
Design of grape gatherers, dancers, an inn, a bewigged gentleman in a swing and another bewigged gentleman holding a bottle and lying under a tree.

tombstone.epitaph:
Valance, 1770–84.
1770–84. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-81.
